description: Add only attribute for the journey category request.

Journey_CategoryObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Journey_CategoryObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Journey_CategoryObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Functional_AreaObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Functional_AreaObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Functional_AreaObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: The data within a journey category instance.

validation.validation: You must use an enabled functional area.
Submit a journey category name that isn't already in use.
